price: 42. En Wij lieten een vloek hen op deze wereld volgen en op de Dag der Opstanding zullen zij onder de verachten zijn.
arabic: وَأَتۡبَعۡنَٰهُمۡ فِي هَٰذِهِ ٱلدُّنۡيَا لَعۡنَةٗۖ وَيَوۡمَ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِ هُم مِّنَ ٱلۡمَقۡبُوحِينَ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: wa-atbaʿnāhum fī hādhihi al-dun'yā laʿnatan wayawma al-qiyāmati hum mina al-maqbūḥīna
translations: And We caused to follow them
